snippet: John Davidson, who spent six years rebuilding the St. Louis Blues as president of hockey operations, has agreed to a buyout of his contract, which has three years and about $6 million remaining.
abstract: John Davidson, who spent six years rebuilding the St Louis Blues as president of hockey operations, agrees to a buyout of his contract.
lead_paragraph: John Davidson, who spent six years rebuilding the St. Louis Blues as president of hockey operations, has agreed to a buyout of his contract, which has three years and about $6 million remaining.

headline.main: Hockey Operations President Davidson Leaves Blues
